passive.name: DAMNATION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DAMNATION
                                Thresh can harvest the Souls of enemies that die near him, each soul permanently granting him 2 Armor and 2 Ability Power.

q.name: (Q) DEATH SENTENCE
q.description:
(Q) DEATH SENTENCE
 17/15/13/11s   70 
                                
                                
                                Throws out a scythe, stunning the first unit hit and pulling them in for 1.5 seconds. The scythe does 80 magic damage (80/130/180/230 + 50% ) and grants True Sight for the duration.Recast: Dashes to the bound enemy.Cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if it hits an enemy.

w.name: (W) DARK PASSAGE
w.description:
(W) DARK PASSAGE
 22/20/18/16s   50 
                                
                                
                                Throws a Lantern to a target location, allowing an ally to tap the Minion Button to dash to Thresh.The Lantern also grants a shield to Thresh and the first ally comes near it, absorbing up to 65 damage (65/115/165/215 + 2 Soul collected) for 4 seconds.

e.name: (E) FLAY
e.description:
(E) FLAY
 12/11/10/9s   60 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Basic attacks deal additional 0 to 58 magic damage  (2 Souls to 2 Souls + 80/100/120/140% ) based on how long since he last attacked.Activate: Thresh whips his chains, pulling or pushing enemies in the direction of the swing. Enemies hit are also slowed by 20/25/30/35% for 1 second and take 65 magic damage (65/105/145/185 + 40% ).

r.name: (R) THE BOX
r.description:
(R) THE BOX
 85/80/75s   100 
                                
                                
                                Creates a prison of spectral walls, slowing champions by 99% for 2 seconds and dealing 250 magic damage (250/400/550 + 100% ). Wall breaks after one collision, and after one is broken, the rest deal half damage and slow for half duration.An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.
